channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bernie Sanders admits ‘Elon Musk is right’ to slash Pentagon with DOGE: ‘Lost track of billions’
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders turned to X on Sunday to say "Elon Musk is right" before going on about the Pentagon's wasteful spending and failed audits.

item.title: Young Men Just Swung towards the GOP. Conservatives Have to Win Them
item.description: If the Right does not promote civil society solutions to the issues facing this demographic, the GOP will continue its leftward drift on social issues...

item.title: Trump asks about 'J-6 Hostages' in response to Biden's pardon of Hunter: 'Such an abuse'
item.description: President-elect Trump asked about "J-6 Hostages" in his reaction to President Biden pardoning his son Hunter Biden.

item.title: NRCC releases 'Dear President Trump' letter for all to sign

item.title: Hunter Biden issues statement after being pardoned by father
item.description: After being pardoned, Hunter Biden says he will 'never take the clemency I have been given today for granted.'

item.title: Lawmakers harshly criticize Biden’s decision to pardon Hunter: ‘Liar’

item.title: When DEI Indoctrination Is Anti-White Racism, Sue
item.description: If segregating people by race and browbeating them about the evil ways of their race is not racial harassment, then what is?

item.title: How ‘Gladiator II’ Rejected Masculinity
item.description: In 'Gladiator,' Maximus embodied masculinity in the highest order. In 'Gladiator II,' masculinity is treated like a bad joke.

item.title: Lori Chavez-DeRemer Would Be A Disaster As Labor Secretary
item.description: Republicans should take the side of their own voters instead of listening to decadent union goons like Sean O’Brien.

item.title: How the Left Doomed Itself
item.description: And how the Right could, too — if it’s not careful.

item.title: Bring on the Cranberries

item.title: Democrat Activists Exploit Tragic Miscarriages Like Mine To Sell Abortions
item.description: Unlike miscarriage, abortion directly and intentionally kills an innocent child who is living, growing, and developing.

item.title: Is Fitness Culture Right-Wing Now?
item.description: Leftists who regard wellness with suspicion hurt the country and themselves.

item.title: Biden pardons son Hunter Biden ahead of exit from Oval Office
item.description: President Biden pardoned his son Hunter Biden after he was convicted in a felony gun case and a separate felony tax case earlier this year.

item.title: 'America First patriot': Kash Patel's nomination wins support from House Speaker Johnson
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson came out in support of Kash Patel, President-elect Donald Trump's pick for director of the FBI.

item.title: Biden pardons Hunter Biden on tax, gun charges despite vow not do so

item.title: MN City ‘Likely Disposed Of’ 21 Ballots In Race Decided For Dem Candidate By 14 Votes
item.description: Two close state House races flipped from Republicans to Democrats, and one of those races has missing ballots.

item.title: Netflix’s ‘Joy’ Shows Early Fears About The Moral Fallout Of IVF Were Justified
item.description: 'Joy' not only diminishes the earliest anxieties about IVF but seeks to mask them under a dramatized, one-sided version of a feel-good story.

item.title: Hunter Biden says his mistakes were 'exploited' for political sport, he will never take pardon for granted
